name: create_playlist
attributes: # [doc = " プレイリスト作成：ID・名前を受け取り、曲数を 0 で初期化"]
body: * ctx . accounts . playlist = Playlist { owner : ctx . accounts . user . key () , bump , playlist_id , name , tracks_count : 0 , } ;

name: add_track
attributes: # [doc = " 曲追加：tracks_count をインクリメント"]
body: let pl = & mut ctx . accounts . playlist ;

name: remove_track
attributes: # [doc = " 曲削除：tracks_count をデクリメント"]
body: let pl = & mut ctx . accounts . playlist ;

fields.name: playlist
fields.attribute: # [doc = " PDA で生成する Playlist アカウント"] # [account (init , payer = user , space = 8 + 32 + 1 + 8 + 4 + 100 + 8 , seeds = [b"playlist" , user . key () . as_ref () , & playlist_id . to_le_bytes ()] , bump)]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " プレイリスト作成者（署名必須）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: playlist
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 既存の Playlist（PDA／bump 検証 + オーナーチェック）"] # [account (mut , seeds = [b"playlist" , owner . key () . as_ref () , & playlist . playlist_id . to_le_bytes ()] , bump = playlist . bump , has_one = owner)]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " プレイリスト所有者（署名必須）"] # [account (signer)]
